projects.name: OneTricks
projects.desc: A simple web application centered around a minimal, yet effective UX made for a game called League of Legends. Received many users in the first few days deployed so far.

projects.name: kindred-api
projects.desc: A full-featured, comprehensive Riot League of Legends API wrapper, with built-in caching and rate-limiting, designed to be simple and consistent.

projects.name: Yelp with Weather
projects.desc: A full-stack web application where users can search for businesses near them along with the weather associated with the results.

projects.name: Django Gradebook
projects.desc: A large gradebook web app intended to provide teachers with many features that would make their workflow easier. I focused on making the UI and UX simple, but great.

projects.name: Frontend Projects
projects.desc: Created & recreated many websites from scratch w/ & w/o libraries. Implemented many modern frontend designs and components.

projects.name: Flask Portfolio & Blog
projects.desc: My old web app I created for the purposes of creating a minimal blog engine and portfolio. Wrote code to automatically generate code, blog posts, and tags.

projects.name: SF Crime Map
projects.desc: A simple web app that plots all recorded crime incidents within San Francisco. Connected with a backend that allows filtering of data.
